law.text: KRS 7.310 to 7.380 do not authorize or permit the publication of information prohibited by law.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 12, effective June 21, 1974. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 9, effective July 1, 1966.

metadata.lrc-note: This is former KRS 6.415 as amended, renumbered by the Reviser of Statutes in 1974.
